name: StayTuned!
description:
Stay Tuned!

Explore and see where it takes you. Be mindful of the weird creature that roams these lands. 

If you are found then... Good Luck!

[Game length ⁓5mins] [Sound ON!]

Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Left Shift Key - Sprint
This game was made using the Unity engine for GDKO2023 Round 2.
3D assets used from:
https://www.kenney.nl/assets and https://quaternius.com/index.html (They're awesome)

Backrooms Texture: https://www.reddit.com/r/TheBackrooms/comments/xu0blg/a_good_backrooms_wallpaper...

Outro Song (We 're Finally Landing by Home):More credit links are pending...
